title: Is There Someone You Need to Thank?
description: Is there someone important you've never properly thanked? Award-winning children's book author, Yuyi Morales, discovers the power of writing a "gratitude letter" to the librarian who changed her life.
itunes:title: Is There Someone You Need to Thank?
itunes:subtitle: Is there someone important you've never properly thanked? Award-winning children's book author, Yuyi Morales, discovers the power of writing a "gratitude letter" to the librarian who changed her life.
itunes:author: PRI and Greater Good Science Center
itunes:summary:
Is there someone important you've never properly thanked? Award-winning children's book author, Yuyi Morales, discovers the power of writing a "gratitude letter" to the librarian who changed her life. 

Support for the podcast come from Audible. 
Want to get inspired? Try books like Dacher Keltner's book, "The Power Paradox" or Yuyi Morales' "Viva Frida."
Start a 30-day trial, and your first audiobook is free at audible.com/HAPPINESS or text HAPPINESS to 500-500.
content:encoded: Is there someone important you've never properly thanked? Award-winning children's book author, Yuyi Morales, discovers the power of writing a "gratitude letter" to the librarian who changed her life.
